verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
verses.translation_en: The Prophet frowned and turned away
verses.translation_zh: 他曾皱眉，而且转身离去，

verses.translation_en: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
verses.translation_zh: 因为那个盲人来到他的面前。

verses.translation_en: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
verses.translation_zh: 你怎能知道呢？他也许能受薰陶，

verses.translation_en: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
verses.translation_zh: 或听忠告，而蒙教益。

verses.translation_en: As for he who thinks himself without need,
verses.translation_zh: 至於自满者，

verses.translation_en: To him you give attention.
verses.translation_zh: 你都逢迎他，

verses.translation_en: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
verses.translation_zh: 他不受薰陶，於你何干？

verses.translation_en: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
verses.translation_zh: 至於殷切地来请教你，

verses.translation_en: While he fears [Allah],
verses.translation_zh: 而且心怀敬畏者，

verses.translation_en: From him you are distracted.
verses.translation_zh: 你却怠慢他。

verses.translation_en: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然！这确是一种教训。

verses.translation_en: So whoever wills may remember it.
verses.translation_zh: 谁欲记诵它，就叫谁记诵它吧。

verses.translation_en: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
verses.translation_zh: 它在珍贵的册业里；

verses.translation_en: Exalted and purified,
verses.translation_zh: 那些册业，是被称扬的，是被涤净的，

verses.translation_en: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
verses.translation_zh: 是在许多书记的手里的；

verses.translation_en: Noble and dutiful.
verses.translation_zh: 那些书记，是尊贵的，是善良的。

verses.translation_en: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
verses.translation_zh: 该死的人！他是何等的忘恩！

verses.translation_en: From what substance did He create him?
verses.translation_zh: 真主曾用什么创造他的呢？

verses.translation_en: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
verses.translation_zh: 是用精液。他曾创造他，并预定他发育的程序。

verses.translation_en: Then He eased the way for him;
verses.translation_zh: 然后，他使他的道路平易。

verses.translation_en: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
verses.translation_zh: 然后，他使他死，并安葬他。

verses.translation_en: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
verses.translation_zh: 然后，当他意欲的时候，他使他复活。

verses.translation_en: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
verses.translation_zh: 绝不然，他还没有奉行他所命令他的事务。

verses.translation_en: Then let mankind look at his food -
verses.translation_zh: 教人观察自己的食物吧！

verses.translation_en: How We poured down water in torrents,
verses.translation_zh: 我将雨水大量地倾注下来。

verses.translation_en: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
verses.translation_zh: 然后，我使地面奇异地裂开，

verses.translation_en: And caused to grow within it grain
verses.translation_zh: 我在大地上生产百谷，

verses.translation_en: And grapes and herbage
verses.translation_zh: 与葡萄和苜蓿，

verses.translation_en: And olive and palm trees
verses.translation_zh: 与橄榄和海枣，

verses.translation_en: And gardens of dense shrubbery
verses.translation_zh: 与茂密的园圃，

verses.translation_en: And fruit and grass -
verses.translation_zh: 水果和牧草，

verses.translation_en: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
verses.translation_zh: 以供你们和你们的牲畜享受。

verses.translation_en: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
verses.translation_zh: 当震耳欲聋的轰声来临的时候，

verses.translation_en: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，各人将逃避自己的弟兄、

verses.translation_en: And his mother and his father
verses.translation_zh: 自己的父母、

verses.translation_en: And his wife and his children,
verses.translation_zh: 自己的妻子儿女；

verses.text: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation_en: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，各人将自顾不暇；

verses.translation_en: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，许多面目是光华的，

verses.translation_en: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
verses.translation_zh: 是喜笑的，是愉快的；

verses.translation_en: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
verses.translation_zh: 在那日，许多面目上，将有灰尘，

verses.translation_en: Blackness will cover them.
verses.translation_zh: 黧黑将蒙薇它。

verses.translation_en: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
verses.translation_zh: 这等人，是不信道的，是荒淫的。
